headline.main: Washington Receiver John Ross Breaks NFL Combine's 40 Record
headline.print_headline: Washington Receiver John Ross Breaks NFL Combine's 40 Record

lead_paragraph: Washington receiver John Ross III has run the 40-yard dash in a record-setting 4.22 seconds at the NFL scouting combine.
snippet: Washington receiver John Ross III has run the 40-yard dash in a record-setting 4.22 seconds at the NFL scouting combine....
